xwikidoc.title: Syntax Highlighting Application
xwikidoc.content:
[[CodeMirror>>http://codemirror.net/]] based syntax highlighting for: * JavaScript * CSS * Velocity * Groovy * Python * XWiki Macros (Experimental)
{{velocity}} #if ($hasGlobalAdmin) For configuration options, go to the [[Administration section>>path:$xwiki.getURL('XWiki.XWikiPreferences', 'admin', 'section=SyntaxHighlighting')]]. #end {{/velocity}}
